actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to permit citizens of Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to collect survivor benefits under the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Permits citizens of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to collect survivor benefits under Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit citizens of Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands to collect survivor benefits under the Social Security Act.
